background: Grew up as the cartographer in the Kadrius system.
education: Attended university on Kadrius.  Almost died in an accident on campus, left before graduating. Eventually received healing to strength, but incurred some debt
terms: Scientist (Researcher): Studied as an archeologist. Worked in a field laboratory.  Gained Vacc Suit 1, 50,000cr, minus 22,500 to healing.
Scientist (Researcher): Studied as an archeologist. Had to leave pack of researchers and joined another pack to continue career, gained +1 EDU.
